channel.title: Need Help with A few codes
channel.description:
Hi, I'am New to making Rsps, and i need to add Dragon Claws, ::unjail, ::give mod, ::giveAdmin, ::givedonator can any one help me please, i'am using Fuzion-pkz source.
Need As much Help As Possible.
Thank You.

item.title: Need Help with A few codes
item.dc:creator: @redemptionpkz redemptionpkz
item.description:

nooooo iam trying to code in d claws + some commands not ::pickup…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 15, 2009, 10:01:59 am[/size][hr]Still need help

item.title: Need Help with A few codes
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

[quote="_, post:16, topic:288547"]Maybe if your pickup command was written correctly, you wouldn’t have any issues.

else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if (/*newItemID <= 30000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! "); } } [/quote]

You said you got 28 errors after the pickup command.

Read full topic

Maybe if your pickup command was written correctly, you wouldn’t have any issues.

"); } }

Close the if statement, please.

item.title: Need Help with A few codes
item.dc:creator: @fatwallet fatwallet
item.description:
@fatwallet wrote:

You should see this when you search “pickup”:

else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 2)) {
				try {
					int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12));
					int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));
					if (/*newItemID <= 30000 && */newItemID >= 0) {
						addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
					} else {
						sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist.");
					}
				} catch(Exception e) {
					sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! ");
				} 
//Add your commands and etc... after this command

Or something close to this. Just add your code underneath the end!

Read full topic

add under customcommand

item.title: Need Help with A few codes
item.dc:creator: @fatwallet fatwallet
item.description:
@fatwallet wrote:

Dragon Claws can be found in the Server Tutorial section, don’t have the time to look it up now but, here are the givemod and admin commands:

if(command.startsWith("giveadmin") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("OwnerName")) {
String name = command.substring(10);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 2;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name+" is now an Administrator");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist");
}
      }
if(command.startsWith("givedonator") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("OwnerName")) {
String name = command.substring(10);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 4;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist");
}
      }
else if(command.startsWith("givemod") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("OwnerName")) {
String name = command.substring(8);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 1;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name+" is now a Moderator");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist");
}
      }

This should work. If there is a sendMessage error, replace sendMessage with sM for more recent server sources. Glad to help!

Read full topic
